template.name: problem_solution
template.description: Classic problem-agitate-solution framework for persuasive content

step.name: Identify the Problem
step.description: Clearly state the challenge or pain point your audience faces
step.example: "Are you struggling to manage multiple projects and deadlines?"

step.name: Agitate the Pain
step.description: Highlight the consequences and frustrations of the problem
step.example: "Missing deadlines leads to stressed teams, unhappy clients, and lost revenue opportunities."

step.name: Present the Solution
step.description: Introduce your product/service as the clear solution
step.example: "Our project management platform streamlines workflow, ensures on-time delivery, and keeps everyone aligned."

step.name: Show the Benefits
step.description: Highlight the positive outcomes and results
step.example: "Teams using our platform report 60% faster project completion and 40% higher client satisfaction."

template.name: benefit_feature
template.description: Focus on benefits rather than just listing features

step.name: Start with the Benefit
step.description: Lead with what the user gains
step.example: "Save 10+ hours per week on administrative tasks"

step.name: Explain the Feature
step.description: Describe how the feature enables the benefit
step.example: "with our automated reporting and scheduling tools"

step.name: Provide Evidence
step.description: Add credibility with data or examples
step.example: "Our customers typically recover 40% of their time previously spent on manual processes."

template.name: storytelling
template.description: Use narrative to engage and persuade

step.name: Set the Scene
step.example: "Meet Sarah, a marketing manager overwhelmed by disconnected data sources..."

step.name: Present the Challenge
step.example: "She spent hours each week compiling reports from different platforms, leaving little time for strategic work."

step.name: Introduce the Solution
step.example: "Then she discovered our integrated analytics platform..."

step.name: Reveal the Transformation
step.description: Highlight the positive outcomes and results
step.example: "Now Sarah generates comprehensive reports in minutes and has reclaimed 15 hours per week for high-impact strategy."
